EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Atlanta Grand Opening Event Tuesday, March 21, 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Please join us for an evening of networking and hospitality at the Pivotal Atlanta Grand Opening Event
Date: Tuesday, March 21, 2017
Time:
Open House Reception 6:30PM to 9:30PM
Location: Pivotal Atlanta Office 675 Ponce de Leon Ave NE, Suite 7500 Atlanta, GA 30308 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Ponce+City+Market,+675+Ponce+De+Leon+Ave+NE,+Atlanta,+GA+30308/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x88f50410912c7be9:0x275114353ab5ce34?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjihMixwoPSAhWowlQKHY0MCAMQ8gEIGTAA]]>)
Register <[[https://pivotal.io/event/atlanta-grand-opening?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=atlanta-open-house-2017]]>
Pivotal has recently moved to one of its newest and fastest growing offices - Atlanta. As a major hub for our partners and clients in the southeast, we are collaborating with some of the most iconic American companies. Located in the revitalized yet historic Ponce City Market, we are among a thriving tech community in the Atlanta innovation scene with direct access to exceptional southern cuisine.
In honor of joining a neighborhood that is dedicated to innovation, Pivotal would like you to join us for a special evening, where you’ll be able to meet and mingle with senior executives from Pivotal, our clients, our partners, and members of the community while enjoying entertainment, drinks and hors d’oeuvres.
Space is limited so register <[[https://pivotal.io/event/atlanta-grand-opening?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=atlanta-open-house-2017]]> today.
We look forward to having you joining us.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email Peter Schmitt at pschmitt@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pschmitt@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
